column4: hi there... i'm trying to repartition and format a 512 CF card using fdisk and mkfs.ext2, but it keeps ending up as 473MB...
a file system structure takes space, that's normal
after using mkfs.ext2 if i then use fdisk again, it doesn't see any partitions and it says  Warning: invalid flag 0x0000 of partition table 4 will be corrected by w(rite)
